original_title: Lots & Lots of Wooden TRAINS Galore!
overview: It's over 45 minutes of colorful entertaining and educational wooden railway fun with real train sounds, fun sing-along songs, lively music, bloopers, and more. See the wood trains go fast and slow, up and down and all across the ground, through tunnels, around curves, and past cities and farms. There are wooden gates and wooden cranes, and diesel and steam trains that go toot-toot. See Christmas, Halloween, and Thomas trains too plus lots, lots more. Toddlers will be dancing and singing along to all the wonderful train songs performed by famous children's musician, James Coffey. It's perfect for party time, playtime, or anytime.
title: Lots & Lots of Wooden TRAINS Galore!
